pullRequest.title: SONARJAVA-3522 Rule S3414: Tests should be kept in a dedicated source directory
pullRequest.bodyText: The main idea is that main sources should not contain any classes with tests.

nodes.bodyText: Remove this Noncompliant message, and replace it by compliant, as we do not expect any issue here. I guess it's a copy-paste issue, but this is misleading.

The issue message seems to come from C# world: Move this test class to a separate assembly in this solution.. I think we should have a different one for java, as this vocabulary does not apply to our context.
The message does not seem appropriate for java projects.
